I was scrolling through previous videos to see if there were any videos that I've missed in a while. As I started scrolling I had realized that I have been watching nearly every video for the past 6 years. From up close and personal butterfly wings to Prince Rupert's drops collaborations with Slow Mo Guys. I've shown countless number of videos to my family and  friends. as I was watching some of your earlier videos I came across this one. I had remembered it being talked about on an episode of no dumb questions. appreciate the time you've taken to upload all of what you have and share your experiences with the world. Thank you very much!!!!!
